title: Eko The First - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts
tags: Archery   Aristocracy   Army Building   Average-looking Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Generals   Hard-Working Protagonist   Leadership   Male Protagonist   Management   Military   Monsters   Nobles   Politics   Royalty   Strategic Battles   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sword And Magic   Thieves   Unique Weapon User   Weak to Strong
author: L.jun
description:
The story is about Mada, a child that is all alone in the world, because his parents died from the war in the massacre of Istal. Now he lives on the island of Arta, with some orphans.

He lives in an orphanage from 8 until 15. And now he join the “Subjugation Military” .>
